vision_content: As one of the leading companies in the field of electronic component manufacturing in Vietnam, Partron Vina Co., Ltd. constantly innovates and pioneers in applying technology to business activities. The implementation of an online auction platform is not only a step forward in diversifying product distribution channels but also demonstrates the company's commitment to enhancing customer experience and optimizing product value.
vision_content_2: Through this platform, Partron Vina aims to create a transparent, fair, and efficient trading environment, while expanding product access opportunities to more customer groups.

company_history: History of Partron Vina Company Limited
vision_p1: As one of the leading companies in the field of electronic component manufacturing in Vietnam, Partron Vina Co., Ltd. continuously innovates and pioneers in applying technology to its business operations. The implementation of the online auction platform is not only a step forward in diversifying product distribution channels but also a demonstration of the company’s commitment to enhancing customer experience and optimizing product value.
vision_p2: Through this platform, Partron Vina aims to create a transparent, fair, and efficient trading environment while expanding access to its products for a broader range of customers.
auction_scope_heading: Fields of Operation for the Auction Platform
auction_scope_1_desc: Providing products manufactured by Partron Vina such as image sensors, antennas, vibration modules, Bluetooth headsets, and other electronic components.
auction_scope_2_desc: Auctioning used or surplus equipment and machinery from the production process to optimize resources and minimize waste.
auction_scope_3_desc: Introducing and auctioning new products, prototypes, or experimental products from the R&D department, giving customers early access to advanced technologies.
auction_scope_4_desc: Expanding the platform to allow partners and suppliers to auction their products, creating a rich and diverse transaction ecosystem.
vision_p3: By launching the online auction platform, Partron Vina not only affirms its pioneering position in the field of technology but also demonstrates a strong commitment to delivering optimal value to customers and partners.
history_title: History of Partron Vina Co., Ltd.
history_milestone_2008_desc: Established at Lot CN11, Khai Quang Industrial Zone, Vinh Yen, Vinh Phuc with initial investment of 4 million USD from Korea.
history_milestone_2015_desc: Total investment increased to 150 million USD.
history_milestone_2024_desc: Continued to expand production scale with total investment reaching 269.4 million USD to meet the demand of the advanced electronics market.
history_scope_desc: Partron Vina is a leading satellite supplier of Samsung Electronics Vietnam and also manufactures components for major brands like Amazon. Products are available in Korea, EU, Brazil, India...
history_contribution_list: Dynamic foreign experts and professional management
Creating jobs for thousands of workers inside and outside Vinh Phuc province
Contributing to local economic development and Vietnam's supporting electronics industry
auction_guide_title: Instructions for Participating in the Auction
auction_guide_step_1_content_1: On the online auction information page, fill in basic information including email, username, and password.
auction_guide_step_1_content_2: Initial registration only requires a username and email.
auction_guide_step_1_content_3: This basic account is sufficient to follow online auctions.
auction_guide_step_2_title: Step 2: Log in and update account information
auction_guide_step_2_content_1: Enter your username and password to log in.
auction_guide_step_2_content_2: After having an account, complete the information update.
auction_guide_step_2_content_3: Once successfully updated, individuals and organizations will have a fully functional user account.
auction_guide_step_3_title: Step 3: Review the Auction Invitation Notice, Auction Rules, and Legal Documents
auction_guide_step_3_content: Interested participants should consult information about the auctioned assets, review the Auction Invitation Notice, Auction Rules, and legal documents available on the online auction information page.
auction_guide_step_4_title: Step 4: Register to participate in the auction
auction_guide_step_4_content: After reviewing the Auction Invitation Notice, Rules, and legal documents, if eligible and willing to participate, proceed to register an account and update the information as described in Step 1 and Step 2.
auction_guide_step_5_content_1: The registrant must submit their documents in accordance with the methods and deadlines specified in the auction rules and instructions sent via email.
auction_guide_step_5_content_2: The application includes documents as stipulated in the auction rules for each asset.
auction_guide_step_6_title: Step 6: Log in to your account and join the Auction Room
auction_guide_step_6_content: Successful registrants log in to the online auction system, click on the logo representing the asset they've registered for, and press the Check-in button to start bidding. On the bidding screen, enter your bid amount and click the 'Bid' button.
contact_1_address_value: Lot 11, Khai Quang Industrial Park, Vinh Phuc Ward, Phu Tho Province, Vietnam.
contact_2_company: Partron Vina Co., Ltd. – Dong Soc Branch
contact_2_address_value: Lot CN03-03, Dong Soc Industrial Cluster, Vinh Tuong Commune, Phu Tho Province, Vietnam.
rule_1: 1. Comply with the legal regulations on property auction.
rule_2: 2. Maintain confidentiality of login accounts, bidder information, and other data in accordance with the law.
rule_3: 3. Ensure objectivity, transparency, safety, and cybersecurity.
rule_4: 4. Protect the legal rights and interests of asset owners, bidders, and relevant individuals or organizations.
